goals.active: Find a way through the traps and into Mazdak's tomb.
goals.complete: Mazdak the Accursed is destroyed. Riannoc's spirit can finally rest in peace. I returned Caladbolg to the Pale Tree, but perhaps one day, I will see the sword again. Meanwhile, I've joined the Durmand Priory. I look forward to seeing more of the world.
